name: Ambag
description:
To prepare for a coming storm, a Babaylan, the village's spiritual leader and shaman, must solve her people's problems by weaving their fates together by visiting the spirit world.

MOVE: WASD/Arrow Keys
INTERACT: Spacebar / J
WEAVE (when weave UI is open): Mouse

---

This game was a part of RISING SEA 2020 -  A collaboration between game creators in South East Asia where game ideas come from unorthodox mediums encouraging creative freedom and experimentation.
